alert.note: Alert for Okeechobee; Orange; Osceola; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 30 at 9:15AM EDT until March 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...DANGEROUS FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ARE EXPECTED THIS AFTERNOON... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, BREEZY AND GUSTY SOUTHEAST WINDS, HIGH DISPERSION, AND DRY GROUND CONDITIONS ACROSS INTERIOR EAST CENTRAL FLORIDA... The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 8 PM EDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA... Orange... Seminole... Osceola... Okeechobee. * WIND...Southeast winds 15 to 20 mph with frequent higher gusts. * HUMIDITY...30 to 35 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
